structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
CITY-COUNTY METROPOLITAN SEWER, SEWER CONSTRUCTION, AND SANITATION DISTRICTS

law.history: Repealed 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 14, sec. 1. -- Created 1956 Ky. Acts ch. 60, sec. 1(1) and (2).

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Board of organized metropolitan sewer district may determine that surface drains are necessary -- When -- Designation of area.
